briefdescription.para: get an uart device by uart device id.

detaileddescription.para:
For how to use uart device hal refer to \ref DEVICE_HAL_UART_DEVSTRUCT "Functions in uart device structure"
uart_id
id of uart, defined by user
!NULL
pointer to an uart device structure
NULL
failed to find the uart device by uart_id
need to implemented by user in user code get an uart device by uart device id.

simplesect.para: MUST be called during system init
